body:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest in Oracle Customer Experience Cloud. The links and information that you requested are below

• Learn more about CX - https://bit.ly/cxmore

• See what the experts are saying about our customer experience strategy by reviewing the latest Analyst Report - https://bit.ly/cxarep

• Five Data Driven Tech Trends Shaping Customer Experience Whitepaper - https://bit.ly/cxwhp

• See how other customers have benefited from Customer Experience Cloud - https://bit.ly/cxref

• Hear more about Oracle CX on YouTube - https://bit.ly/cxvideos



Thank you,

Oracle team
